org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.GridCacheEvictionPolicy

Packages that use GridCacheEvictionPolicy
org.gridgain.grid.cache  Start Here  Contains main In-Memory Data Grid APIs.

org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.never Contains cache Never eviction policy implementations. 
org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.random Contains cache randomized eviction policy implementations.

Uses of GridCacheEvictionPolicy in org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.always
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.always that implement GridCacheEvictionPolicy
 class GridCacheAlwaysEvictionPolicy<K,V>
          Cache eviction policy that expires every entry essentially keeping the cache empty.
 

Uses of GridCacheEvictionPolicy in org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.fifo
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.fifo that implement GridCacheEvictionPolicy
 class GridCacheFifoEvictionPolicy<K,V>
          Eviction policy based on First In First Out (FIFO) algorithm.
 

Uses of GridCacheEvictionPolicy in org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.lirs
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.lirs that implement GridCacheEvictionPolicy
 class GridCacheLirsEvictionPolicy<K,V>
          Very efficient implementation of LIRS cache eviction policy which often provides better hit ratio than the LRU eviction policy.
 

Uses of GridCacheEvictionPolicy in org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.lru
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.lru that implement GridCacheEvictionPolicy
 class GridCacheLruEvictionPolicy<K,V>
          Eviction policy based on Least Recently Used (LRU) algorithm.
 

Uses of GridCacheEvictionPolicy in org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.never
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.never that implement GridCacheEvictionPolicy
 class GridCacheNeverEvictionPolicy<K,V>
          Cache eviction policy that does not do anything.
 

Uses of GridCacheEvictionPolicy in org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.random
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.random that implement GridCacheEvictionPolicy
 class GridCacheRandomEvictionPolicy<K,V>
          Cache eviction policy which will select random cache entry for eviction if cache size exceeds the GridCacheRandomEvictionPolicy.getMaxSize() parameter.
